statements: SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponseTimes WHERE emergency_type='Fire' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT emergency_type, response_time FROM EmergencyResponseTimes WHERE response_time > 10 ORDER BY response_time ASC
SELECT DISTINCT emergency_type FROM EmergencyResponseTimes
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponseTimes WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(response_time) AS avg_response_time FROM EmergencyResponseTimes
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponseTimes WHERE emergency_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY report_date DESC, response_time ASC
SELECT emergency_type, AVG(response_time) AS average_response_time FROM EmergencyResponseTimes GROUP BY emergency_type ORDER BY average_response_time DESC
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponseTimes WHERE response_time > 10 AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT emergency_type FROM EmergencyResponseTimes WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(response_time) AS total_responses, AVG(response_time) AS average_response_time FROM EmergencyResponseTimes
SELECT * FROM emergency_types;
SELECT emergency_type_name, emergency_description FROM emergency_types;
SELECT * FROM response_times WHERE response_time_seconds > 300;
SELECT * FROM emergency_types ORDER BY emergency_type_name DESC;
SELECT response_time_seconds, date_reported FROM response_times WHERE emergency_type_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM emergency_types;
SELECT emergency_type_name, emergency_description FROM emergency_types WHERE emergency_type_id = 1;
SELECT response_time_seconds, date_reported FROM response_times ORDER BY response_time_seconds DESC;

SELECT emergency_type_name, MAX(response_time_seconds) AS max_time FROM emergency_types JOIN response_times ON emergency_types.emergency_type_id = response_times.emergency_type_id GROUP BY emergency_type_name;
SELECT DISTINCT emergency_type_name FROM response_times INNER JOIN emergency_types ON response_times.emergency_type_id = emergency_types.emergency_type_id WHERE response_time_seconds > 60;
SELECT * FROM emergencies
SELECT emergency_type, emergency_location FROM emergencies WHERE response_time_in_seconds > 300
SELECT emergency_id, emergency_type FROM emergencies WHERE emergency_location = 'City Hall'
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE availability = TRUE
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC
SELECT emergency_id, emergency_type, emergency_location FROM emergencies WHERE response_time_in_seconds < 60;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY resource_name DESC;

SELECT r.resource_name, e.emergency_type, re.response_time_in_seconds FROM resources r JOIN reports re ON r.resource_id = re.resource_id JOIN emergencies e ON e.emergency_id = re.emergency_id WHERE re.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT e.emergency_id, e.emergency_type, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM emergencies e JOIN reports r ON e.emergency_id = r.emergency_id GROUP BY e.emergency_id, e.emergency_type;

SELECT e.emergency_location, r.resource_name, re.report_date FROM emergencies e JOIN reports re ON e.emergency_id = re.emergency_id JOIN resources r ON re.resource_id = r.resource_id WHERE e.emergency_type = 'Fire';
SELECT * FROM emergency_type;
SELECT emergency_name FROM emergency_type ORDER BY emergency_name DESC;
SELECT emergency_name, emergency_id FROM emergency_type WHERE emergency_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(response_time) FROM response_times;
SELECT AVG(resources_allocated) AS avg_resources FROM resource_allocation;
SELECT * FROM emergency_type;
SELECT emergency_name, emergency_id FROM emergency_type ORDER BY emergency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM response_times WHERE response_time > 5;
SELECT emergency_name, resources_allocated FROM resource_allocation JOIN emergency_type ON resource_allocation.emergency_id = emergency_type.emergency_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, DATE(date_time) AS log_date FROM optimization_logs GROUP BY DATE(date_time);
SELECT * FROM response_times_emergency_types;
SELECT emergency_type, response_time FROM response_times_emergency_types;
SELECT report_date, location, resources_needed FROM emergency_reports;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM emergency_response_team;
SELECT * FROM response_times_emergency_types ORDER BY emergency_type ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, location FROM emergency_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM emergency_response_team WHERE team_size > 10 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT resource_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY resource_type ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_inventory WHERE available_quantity < 100;
